title: Interpreting scientific data
creator_credit: Educational Media Australia and Ken J. Widdowson
brief_description: Presents a case study of a citrus orchard to allow students to interpret the results of an experiment based on scientific data supplied by a trained horticulturalist. Portrays science as a continuing process of inquiry.
creator_credit_for_label: Educational Media Australia and Ken J. Widdowson
description: Presents a case study of a citrus orchard to allow students to interpret the results of an experiment based on scientific data supplied by a trained horticulturalist. Portrays science as a continuing process of inquiry.
